about_the_game:
Welcome to a Horror Open World, Story-Driven, Racing RPG Game.


You have shipwrecked on Carbon Crest Island. The Deal is Sealed. Either, Race and Win through the deadly race trials set up by the deranged Count Levoy OR Lose & Suffer an eternity under his mercy.

• The Carbon Crest Island - No turning back

A Lonely Island in the middle of a vast ocean, that is not easily found.
Anyone who sets foot is subject to the whims of the Forgotten Count Levoy. You can find creepy forests, abandoned racetracks, Vacant buildings, and wandering ghosts who fell prey to this Island’s hex – The Cursed Deal of The Ghost Count Levoy.

• The Deal is Sealed - What to do Now?

“You shall win or forever remain bound”.
There is no way out. Your only option is to Win the Challenging Racing Obstacles designed by The Count and defeat him. Losing the Race will cost your Life and you will be trapped in this Desolate Island forever.

• You're not alone? Keep your Eyes Open.

A mysterious man is helping you. Can you trust him or is it one of the notorious schemes of The Count? But you have no choice. Get All the help you can because you will need it to win the tough racing hurdles.
Explore around, upgrade the car, and win races (if you can), as you delve into different parts of the strange island.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 11
